title: The eligible existing area under commercial/office/shops/industrial establishments/structures for potters business activity shall be computed on actual measurement/inspection, and/or on the basis of official documents such as License under Shops and Establishment Act, Trade License, Factory License, Electricity bills and Photo pass etc
clause_text: The eligible existing area under commercial/office/shops/industrial establishments/structures for potters business activity shall be computed on actual measurement/inspection, and/or on the basis of official documents such as License under Shops and Establishment Act, Trade License, Factory License, Electricity bills and Photo pass etc.
